Class RvForRequests

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RvForRequests.ViewHolder>
com.example.omrifit.adapters.RvForRequests
public class RvForRequests extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RvForRequests.ViewHolder>
RecyclerView Adapter for handling friend requests.
